text: Nurul Islam Babul (3 May 1946 â€“ 13 July 2020) was a Bangladeshi businessman. He was the chairman of the business conglomerate Jamuna Group. He was born in the Noakhali District in Bangladesh. He was arrested two times, one for murder and the second for possible tax evasion. Babul died on 13 July 2020 after being hospitalized in Dhaka for COVID-19, aged 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bangladesh Category:Bangladeshi businesspeople Category:People from Chittagong Division
title: Nurul Islam Babul
